channel.title: [562] Client.jar Wont Open [562]
channel.description:
Hi Guys,
I have a 562 client which I pretty much jaréd and signed through jar maker following this tutorial: [url=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NghjX3L41y4"](TUT)[/url] Everything i do is right, and the tutorial i believe is good too but when i try open client.jar it just doesnt open. Nothing happens.
I have made sure that the jar maker generated a batch file with the client, the response i get is :
[code] THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "client.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)
C:\Users\*Name*\Desktop>java -jar client.jar Bad argument count, Usage: worldid, <live/rc/wip>, <english/german>, <game0/game 1> Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Can anyone tell me what the problem here is?

item.title: [562] Client.jar Wont Open [562]
item.dc:creator: @brynd63 brynd63
item.description:
@brynd63 wrote:

Include a world ID I think?
I know nothing about private servers so I’m only presuming.

C:\Users*Name*\Desktop>java -jar client.jar client 1 live english game0

possibly? This will most likely not work. But worth a try lol.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Client.jar Wont Open [562]
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:2, topic:508538”]C:\Users\*Name*\Desktop>java -jar client.jar Bad argument count, Usage: worldid, <live/rc/wip>, <english/german>, <game0/game 1>
your problem[/quote]

Ok, and what does it mean? How do i fix this?

Hi Guys,

I have a 562 client which I pretty much jaréd and signed through jar maker following this tutorial: url=http://“http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NghjX3L41y4”[/url] Everything i do is right, and the tutorial i believe is good too but when i try open client.jar it just doesnt open. Nothing happens.
